ValidationRule.description: The record's Inquiry object is related to a specific record type called "Exclusive_Project". The Status field is set to "Submitted".If the Company field is not blank then the corporate parameter is required.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(Inquiry__r.RecordType.DeveloperName = "Exclusive_Project", RecordType.Name = 'UAE', ISPICKVAL(AML_Type__c, 'Corporate'), ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Submitted'), NOT(ISBLANK( Contact__c )))&& (AND (ISBLANK(Customer_s_Country_of_Registration__c )) || ISBLANK(Beneficial_Owner_Country_of_Citizenship__c ) || ISBLANK(Year_of_Establishment__c ) || ISBLANK(Financial_Information_Documents__c ) || ISBLANK(Industry__c ) || ISBLANK(Mode_of_Payment__c ) || ISBLANK(Other_businesses_of_the_client__c ) || ISBLANK( Screening_Shareholder__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: All Corporate AML Parameters are Required & Also, Please fill in Employment/Business Industry, Mode of Payment, Screening/ Shareholder
